name: Who let the Doggos in?
description:
Controls

Keyboard:

  • move: W A S D 
  • action: E
  • mute: M
  • start game: Enter
  • join game anytime: E

Gamepad:

  • move: Joystick
  • action: Button `A`
  • jump: Button `B` / Joystick Up
  • start game: Start
  • join game anytime: Button 'A'

Up to 4 players!

Tips

👩‍🌾💲🌲 Buy plants from the shop keeper. 

🌞💦🌲 Water the plants and give them light so they grow. But don’t let them stay too long outside, or they’ll dry! 

🍅🚚💲 Collect the Tomatoes with the Bucket, and sell them in the truck for moneys! 

🍅🐶💖 Feed Tomatoes to the Doggo to keep them alive. 

🐶💀 Don’t let any Doggo starve.

Credits

Programming, graphics and game design by:

  • Albert Martínez
  • Albert Vaca Cintora

Music by:

  • Veuskemini

Tileset based on work by OpenPixelProject, pug Sprite by Oren J Nero.

Dog sounds by Felix Blume, jump sounds by Ace Brian and Felix Yadomi.

Tile collision algorithm by Jordi Santiago, Animation system by Mario Gonzalez, RichText by Cristian Pallarés.
